attributes.action: prevent local authorities from charging residents to park within their controlled parking zones.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The idea that residents must pay to park near their homes in controlled parking zones is little more than a revenue generating scam.

Controlled parking zones result in fewer parking spaces. Parking across drives is not allowed & smaller spaces (for smaller 'green' cars) are automatically excluded.

Furthermore, local authorities use CPZ schemes as revenue generators by issuing only limited visiting permits (at a time) and uneccessarily strict rules. For instance cars parked slightly outside of marked bays can be given penalties.
